full_text: 305-9312200 Herman & Mermelstein, P. 2- 5-08; 11:34AM; PRIVATE BA 06:06:49 p.m. 05-02-2008 3/3 835 9720 # 5/ 19 IN THE CIRCUIT COURT OF THE FIFTEENTH JUDICIAL CIRCUIT, IN AND FOR PALM BEACH COUNTY, FLORIDA CASE NO. 2006CF009454AXX STATE OF FLORIDA vs. JEFFREY EPSTEIN, Defendant. SUBPOENA FOR DEPOSITION TO: YOU ARE COMMANDED to appear before a person authorized by law to take depositions on the 4th floor (Rooms 4.2004-4.2010), of the Palm Beach County Courthouse, 205 North Dixie Highway, West Palm Beach, Florida on February 6, 2008 at 9:30 a.m. for the taking of your deposition in this action. If you fail to appear, you may be in contempt of court. You are subpoenaed to appear by the following attorneys and unless excused from this subpoena by these attorneys or the Court, you shall respond to this subpoena as directed. WITNESS my hand and seal of said Court on this 29th day of January, 2008. Jack A. Goldberg, ESQ. For the Court 250 Australian Avenue South, Suite 1400 West Palm Beach, Florida 33401 (561) 659-8300 07/26/17 Page 78 of 114 Public Records Request No.: 17-295 DOJ-OGR-00030431

text_blocks.content: IN THE CIRCUIT COURT OF THE FIFTEENTH JUDICIAL CIRCUIT, IN AND FOR PALM BEACH COUNTY, FLORIDA
STATE OF FLORIDA vs. JEFFREY EPSTEIN, Defendant.

YOU ARE COMMANDED to appear before a person authorized by law to take depositions on the 4th floor (Rooms 4.2004-4.2010), of the Palm Beach County Courthouse, 205 North Dixie Highway, West Palm Beach, Florida on February 6, 2008 at 9:30 a.m. for the taking of your deposition in this action. If you fail to appear, you may be in contempt of court.
You are subpoenaed to appear by the following attorneys and unless excused from this subpoena by these attorneys or the Court, you shall respond to this subpoena as directed.
WITNESS my hand and seal of said Court on this 29th day of January, 2008.
For the Court 250 Australian Avenue South, Suite 1400 West Palm Beach, Florida 33401 (561) 659-8300

additional_notes: The document is a subpoena for deposition in a court case involving Jeffrey Epstein. It is dated January 29, 2008, and requires the recipient to appear on February 6, 2008. The document is signed by Jack A. Goldberg, ESQ. and includes contact information for the court.
